Description: We are looking for creative and driven salespeople to be part of dynamic team and collaborative culture. At Metlife, we embrace diversity, equity, and inclusion, allowing us to think bigger, experiment, innovate, and win together.Skills
Skills:
A bachelor's degree in business or any related field - with at least two years of sales experience.
eagerness to drive sales and build a new portfolio, meet new customers, and create new business opportunities.
Thrive to achieve sales targets.
